name: The Best Car Game Ever Created
name_original: The Best Car Game Ever Created
description:
When you download this game, you will be able to play the best arcarde car game ever created.

With its high-end game engine, that is based on code of the 90's, and minutes of hard work put into it, there is just no game that is able to compete with the quality of this masterpiece.

Overwhelming graphics and a physics engine with a personality of a nasty teen, "The Best Car Game Ever Created" already pleased hundrets of players.

Just download it.

Now.

Go!

You are still reading! Go download it! It is free!!

Now let us stop the sarcasm. "The Best Car Game Ever Created" is made with Blender Game Engine, and it was a weekend project of SimonrazerLP, because he was bored. Unfortunatly, he can not get more accurat physics with it. It has 12 levels in no particular order. Leave a comment and tell us what you think.

READ THE KEYBINDINGS YOU HAVE NO CHANCE WITHOUT THEM!!!
